attributes.action: Let Callum Moreman, a key member of NUOTC ski committee, come on the ski trip
attributes.additional_details: Callum Moreman, has not been allocated a place on te annual NUOTC ski trip, despite being not only a key member of the ski committee, but NUOTC as a unit, he has added value by working every Monday evening, being part of a bronze medal winning Cambrian team and also helping and establishing the ski committee, as well as being a great person.
